            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Anishinaabe world view on water states "We have the right and responsibility to protect the water". Based on this view, Grand Council Treaty #3's (GCT3) long-term vision for the program is to protect and preserve the traditional waters of the Anishinaabe people from all 28 Treaty #3 First Nations by empowering and educating them through long-term stewardship and capacity-building opportunities. The goals of the CBM program are to protect and preserve traditional waters; build the environmental knowledge and capacity of Treaty #3 members; and prioritize youth engagement in the program.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-ifkt-d571
notes: The Anishinaabe world view on water states "We have the right and responsibility to protect the water". Based on this view, Grand Council Treaty #3's (GCT3) long-term vision for the program is to protect and preserve the traditional waters of the Anishinaabe people from all 28 Treaty #3 First Nations by empowering and educating them through long-term stewardship and capacity-building opportunities. The goals of the CBM program are to protect and preserve traditional waters; build the environmental knowledge and capacity of Treaty #3 members; and prioritize youth engagement in the program.

notes_translated.en: The Anishinaabe world view on water states "We have the right and responsibility to protect the water". Based on this view, Grand Council Treaty #3's (GCT3) long-term vision for the program is to protect and preserve the traditional waters of the Anishinaabe people from all 28 Treaty #3 First Nations by empowering and educating them through long-term stewardship and capacity-building opportunities. The goals of the CBM program are to protect and preserve traditional waters; build the environmental knowledge and capacity of Treaty #3 members; and prioritize youth engagement in the program.
notes_translated.fr: La vision du monde anishinaabe sur l'eau affirme que « nous avons le droit et la responsabilité de protéger l'eau ». Sur la base de ce point de vue, la vision à long terme du programme du Grand Council Treaty #3 (GCT3) est de protéger et de préserver les eaux traditionnelles du peuple anishinaabe des 28 Premières nations visées par le Traité #3 en les responsabilisant et en les éduquant grâce à des opportunités de gestion à long terme et de renforcement des capacités. Les objectifs du programme CBM sont de protéger et de préserver les eaux traditionnelles ; de renforcer les connaissances et les capacités environnementales des membres du Traité #3 ; et de donner la priorité à l'engagement des jeunes dans le programme.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Grand Council Treaty #3 Basic Water Quality Parameters

title_translated.en: Grand Council Treaty #3 Basic Water Quality Parameters
title_translated.fr: Traité du Grand Conseil #3 Paramètres de base de la qualité de l'eau
